definitions.definition: Making amends to restore a damaged relationship ; expiation .
The reconciliation of God and mankind through the death of Jesus .
Reconciliation ; restoration of friendly relations; concord .

main_definition: Making amends to restore a damaged relationship ; expiation .
secondary_definitions: ( theology , often with capitalized initial ) The reconciliation of God and mankind through the death of Jesus .
( archaic ) Reconciliation ; restoration of friendly relations; concord .
